summary: Page 85 (left side), chapter 5. Continuation of section 120 from previous page, then sections 121-126. All sections well captured with minor text issues.

issues.description: OCR added nikud (vowel points) on the word 'הֵשִׁיב' which are not present in the original printed text. Also, OCR uses 'ה'' for Hashem's name but the image uses 'ד'' (dalet with geresh) as is typical in printed sefarim.
OCR has 'העוסקי' (defective) where image shows 'העוסקים' (full spelling).
OCR has 'מקרע"ה' but the standard abbreviation for Moshe Rabbeinu Alav HaShalom is 'מרע"ה'. The extra kuf is likely an OCR error.
